contexts: Also like listening and occasionally playing music. Worked as Machine learning intern at Cybercure Technologies. Working as Data Scientist at EZ Works. Professional experience of more than 1 year. Om went to JSSATE, Noida for graduation. Went to Amity Internation School for 12th. Created Drone in 2018. Created LFR(Line Followin Robot), BMI calculating machine as electronics project. Created Sales forcasting for Cybercure Technologies, using time series network. At EZ Works worked on problems of tabular structure detection, OCR for arabic languages and Neural Machine Translation.
